Pre-Game Insights: The Royals have a strong recent performance with a series sweep against the Twins and a 5-0 win over the Yankees in the opener.
The Yankees struggled in their series against the Cubs, losing Sunday and mustering only three hits on Tuesday.
Luis Gil has a 13-6 record with a 3.24 ERA this season, while Cole Ragans has a 11-9 record with a 3.39 ERA.
Six of the Yankees' last seven home games as favorites have gone OVER the total runs line.
Aaron Judge has hit at least one home run in four of the Yankees' last six home games against AL opponents.
Giancarlo Stanton has recorded a Double in three of his last four appearances at Yankee Stadium.
DJ LeMahieu has scored at least one run in each of his last seven appearances against the Royals at Yankee Stadium.
Vinnie Pasquantino has recorded at least one RBI in each of his last eight Wednesday appearances against teams that held a winning record.
Bobby Witt Jr. has recorded at least one hit in each of the Royals' last 14 night games against AL East opponents that held a winning record.
Miscellaneous Highlights: This is the final installment in a three-game series between the Royals and Yankees.
The Royals have a strong lineup with notable players like Bobby Witt Jr. and Salvador Perez.
